description:
This cassette from the Ultegra series provides smooth, lightning-quick shifting. The tolerances have been increased compared to previous models for even better performance.

  • Aluminum sprocket carrier and alloy lock ring keep the cogs in check when shifting under load
  • Sprockets have a nickel-plated finish
  • Compatible with super narrow HG 10-speed chains
name: Shimano Ultegra CS-6700 10 Speed 11-28T Cassette
